Title: Elixir Experiment
Description:
Our alchemists have recently looked into a variety of new ingredients for experimentation. Their most recent interest is... interesting... to say the least.

It appears that gorloc mucus has some properties that can be beneficial for certain elixirs.
ObjectivesText: Gather 15 Gorloc Mucus from the gorlocs of the Dragon Isles for Dhurrel of the Maruuk Centaurs.
